short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suspend tabs when not in use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save system resources by letting your un-used tabs sleep when not in use!  SleepyTabs suspends tabs after a set time of non-use, or you can force tabs to sleep whenever you want!
